channel.title: Internet Radio on Radio4000 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Internet Radio on Radio4000 Blog

item.title: Map for Radio4000
item.description: There is a new way to discover Radio4000 channels online, a map of the world. As of today everyone can position their Radio4000 channel to one location in the world. So can you! There are no restriction, nor any obligation. As always freedom first. You only decide if and where you would like your channel to appear on the map; where your body resides or your heart belongs, it is and will remain your choice.
